prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Chromatic Percussion, Drums, Piano, Guitar, but without Bass.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Chromatic Percussion, Drums, Piano, and Guitar, but no Bass.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Chromatic Percussion, Drums, Piano, and Guitar, omitting Bass.

Style 3:
This composition is comprised of Chromatic Percussion, Drums, Piano, and Guitar, Bass excluded.
